page.title: 20MAIN FINDINGS & CREDITS
page.content:
Older residents of the area have expressed concern at the decline of village life.There is no school in the area.The local Womens' Institute has been disbanded.The opportunity for employment on local farms has decreased.Newcomers to the villages tend to work in nearby towns and spend little time in the villages.
CREDITS This survey was conducted by children of the {NORMANS}class, Cubbington C.E. Combined School.Texts were written by: Claire Aitken,Matthew Astill,Michelle Hope,Darren Avern, Helen Schofield,Zoe Harris, Alan Coleman,Justin Randle, Claire Glover,Kerry Clements, Amy Harrison and Rebekah Mattacola.
Amy Harrison,Zoe Harris
